sentences.en: A one - hour OVA, Fullmetal Alchemist: Reflections Special OVA, was released in 2005.
sentences.cn: 一小时的卵, 钢之炼金术士: 反思特别卵, 在2005年获释.

sentences.en: Alchemist easier to upgrade than the pastor.
At first glance, it all seems an alchemist's illusion.
sentences.cn: 乍看上去, 它完全象是一位炼金术士的幻术.

sentences.en: Changed the Crazy Alchemist Potion so it always gives health and mana.
sentences.cn: 改变了疯狂炼金师药水的效果,使其一定给予生命和魔法值.

sentences.en: He seems an alchemist, scooping out the true meaning of the building continuously, creating concise beauty.
sentences.cn: 他像是一位炼金术士, 不断挖掘建筑的真谛, 创造简约的美.

sentences.en: If you would like to order other Full Alchemist doujinshi, please write to us.
sentences.cn: 若是您想购买其他钢之鍊金术师同人志, 请来信询问.

sentences.en: It is this burden that the young Alchemist is Edward Elric.
sentences.cn: 而这正是这位年轻的炼金术士,爱德华,所担负的责任.

sentences.en: Kelley was a notorious forger, mystic and alchemist who was familiar with Cardan grilles.
sentences.cn: 凯利是个恶名昭彰的伪造者 、 秘主义者和炼金术士,相当熟悉卡丹格板.

sentences.en: Our industrialists are transforming sand and oil into ever smaller and more intricate machines, a form of alchemy more wondrous than anything any alchemist ever dreamed of.
sentences.cn: 工业家正在将沙和石油转化为更为小巧、更为复杂的机器，这是一种连历史中的炼金术士做梦都无法想到的魔法。

sentences.en: The Alchemist is my favorite novel.
sentences.cn: 《炼金术士》是我最喜欢的小说.

sentences.en: The original museum of 1683 was based on the collections of Elias Ashmole, alchemist and antiquarian , a leading figure of "The New Philosophy".
sentences.cn: 1683年老馆里的展品基本是伊莱亚斯·阿什莫尔的藏品。 他是一位炼金术士和古文物收集者，也是“新哲学”的领军人物。

sentences.en: The whole picture thus uses alchemist symbols to illustrate a spiritual journey to perfection.
sentences.cn: 整幅图画因而利用炼金术的符号举例说明尽善尽美的精神升华过程.

sentences.en: The word chemist was coined by shortening alchemist, and the term chemistry followed.
sentences.cn: 化学家一词是由缩短炼金术士和化学之后短期.

sentences.en: Would you rather be an alchemist or a chemist?
sentences.cn: 那么，你想做一个炼金术士，还是一个化学家呢？

trans.tran_en: An alchemist was a scientist in the Middle Ages who tried to discover how to change ordinary metals into gold
